fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Disguise a Mafia member as a non-Mafia player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first target will appear to be your second’s role to all non-Mafia investigative effects.
- Your first target’s name will appear as your second’s to all non-Mafia investigative effects.
- Your target will not count as a member of the Mafia for all non-Mafia investigative effects.
